description: A contract to supply Ukraine with refurbished light armoured vehicles is officially dead, the defence minister told a House of Commons committee on Tuesday.
title: Canada cancels plan to donate refurbished armour to Ukraine: defence minister

description: A five-year-old girl who fell overboard from a Disney Dream cruise ship in June had been posing for a photo at the request of her mother, according to Florida authorities in reports obtained by CBC News. The girl and her father, who jumped in after her, were both rescued.
title: Child fell off Disney cruise ship after mom told her to pose for photo on railing, police say

description: Ontario Provincial Police have issued an Amber Alert for a missing one-year-old girl last seen in Brampton.
title: Amber Alert in place for one-year-old girl missing in Brampton, Ont.: OPP

description: Whether it’s the ongoing anti-ICE p
title: How wacky inflatable costumes are changing the narrative around U.S. protests

description: Roughly 70,000 people were approved for coverage under the public dental insurance program, but were later deemed ineligible or had been assessed for an incorrect copayment level, Health Canada said Tuesday.
title: Tens of thousands mistakenly approved for dental coverage, Health Canada says

description: A man whose convictions for storming the U.S. Capitol were erased by President Donald Trump's mass pardons has been arrested on a charge that he threatened to kill Democratic House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries.
title: Trump-pardoned U.S. Capitol rioter charged with threatening to kill Democrat Hakeem Jeffries

description: With food inflation increasing in September, the Conservatives are blasting the federal Liberals over the cost of living, as the minority government prepares to table a budget that will need the support of at least one other party.
title: With food inflation rising, Conservatives demand Liberal action on cost of living

description: OpenAI said Tuesday it is introducing its own web browser, Atlas, putting the ChatGPT maker in direct competition with Google as more internet users rely on artificial intelligence to answer their questions.
title: OpenAI launches its own web browser in challenge to Google Chrome

description: The story behind the 1983 song that took the Jays to a World Series championship run.
title: The oral history of OK Blue Jays

description: Brandy Cooney and Becky Hamber were trying to adopt the boy and his brother in Burlington, Ont. Now, with their trial underway in Milton, they’re charged with first-degree murder, abuse, assault with a weapon and confinement.
title: Doctor saw severely malnourished boy in care of 2 Ontario women just days before his death, expert tells trial

description: In a nail-biter Game 7 of the American League Championship Series, the Toronto Blue Jays defeated the Seattle Mariners 4-3, sending the Jays to the World Series for the first time since 1993. Game 1 between the Jays and the Los Angeles Dodgers is Friday in Toronto.
title: IN PHOTOS | The best moments of ALCS Game 7

description: Sources tell CBC News the Vatican and the Canadian Catholic Church are making good progress toward an agreement to return Indigenous cultural objects before the end of the year, in a handoff facilitated by the Canadian Conference of Catholic Bishops.
title: Indigenous artifacts held in Vatican Museums finally heading back to Canada

description: Sources tell CBC News the Vatican and the Canadian Catholic Church are making good progress toward an agreement to return Indigenous cultural objects before the end of the year, in a handoff facilitated by the Canadian Conference of Catholic Bishops.
title: Indigenous artifacts held in Vatican Museums finally heading back to Canada
Auditor general uncovers unsafe drinking water, toilets that don't work in military housing
In scathing report, auditor general finds CRA call centres are slow to answer and often inaccurate

description: Dozens of officials from across the U.S. government, including intelligence officers, has been helping to steer President Donald Trump's drive for retribution against his perceived enemies, according to government records and a source familiar with the effort.
title: 'Weaponization' group of U.S. officials reportedly helping Trump root out his perceived enemies

description: General Motors has confirmed it is ending production of its BrightDrop electric delivery vans at the CAMI Assembly plant in Ingersoll, leaving the future of the Oxford County facility uncertain.
title: GM to end electric van production at CAMI plant in Ingersoll, Ont.

description: Canada's annual inflation rate rose 2.4 per cent in September, as gas and travel tour prices fell at a slower pace and grocery prices rose, Statistics Canada said Tuesday.
title: Canada's annual inflation rate rose 2.4% in September

description: For decades, American hunters have come to Gravelbourg to hunt geese and ducks near the town southwest of Regina, fuelling the multimillion-dollar outfitting industry. While Canada-U.S. tensions might have ruffled some feathers, outdoor opportunities and friendships have kept bringing these hunters back to Saskatchewan.
title: Sask. town thankful Americans keep flocking here to hunt, amid Canada-U.S. tensions

description: A man who sent a Facebook message that said, "So I raped you," to a woman he had sexually assaulted years earlier in college was sentenced on Monday to two to four years in prison.
title: Man who admitted college campus sexual assault to victim in a Facebook message sentenced to prison
Jeromy Farkas edges Sonya Sharp in tight Calgary mayoral race
Jeromy Farkas narrowly beats Sonya Sharp in election marked by long lines, low turnout

description: Hardline conservative Sanae Takaichi was elected Japan's first female prime minister on Tuesday, shattering the nation's glass ceiling and setting it up for a forceful turn to the right.
title: Sanae Takaichi becomes Japan's 1st female PM, setting country up for forceful turn to the right

description: Hardline conservative Sanae Takaichi was elected Japan's first female prime minister on Tuesday, shattering the nation's glass ceiling and setting it up for a forceful turn to the right.
title: Sanae Takaichi becomes Japan's first female PM, setting country up for forceful turn to the right

description: More than a year after a workplace incident Brent Bowden says was racially motivated, the Truro police constable remains off the job.
title: His fellow officers threw a banana peel on his truck. This Black N.S. constable hasn't returned to duty since
The consensus on immigration is crumbling as 8 in 10 Conservatives say too many are coming in: poll

description: Four out of five teenagers aren’t meeting physical activity recommendations, according to new data from Statistics Canada, and experts say without big changes, physical activity will keep losing out to screens and social media when it comes to teens.
title: 4 out of 5 teens aren’t getting enough physical activity in Canada

description: The Royal Canadian Air Force is defending its pilot bonus pay system after an internal review criticized it as poorly thought out. Pilots are also not happy, filing dozens of grievances. The experience-based system, which mimics commercial airlines' pay scales, has meant some captains are turning down promotions because it’ll cost them money.
title: Air force defends bonus pay system as pilots file dozens of grievances, refuse promotions

description: Studies combing through past patient data have made a similar link between drugs like Ozempic and a loss of appetite for more than just food.
title: Alcohol, nicotine and more — could drugs like Ozempic curb the desire for vices?

description: After dangling the prospect of supplying Ukraine with Tomahawk cruise missiles, Trump has backed away from a deal and said repeatedly that he believes Putin wants peace.
title: On Ukraine, Trump reverts yet again to the Kremlin's view

description: Arfon Barow, 64, says she was injured in a hate-motivated attack at an OC Transpo station in August. Ottawa police charged a woman with assault causing bodily harm, but never publicized the incident as they have in several similar cases.
title: Victim of alleged hate crime at transit station questions 'total silence' that followed

description: Jyoti Gondek, who defeated 26 challengers in 2021 to become the first female mayor in the city's history, conceded the 2025 mayoral race at a campaign party at the Palomino Smokehouse in Calgary shortly before midnight Monday.
title: Jyoti Gondek concedes Calgary mayoral race, but final result still too close to call
